name: VitesyHub
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Amazon Alexa to control your sustainable air purifier. 

You can connect: 
- Eteria
- Natede Smart
- Natede

Through Alexa you can get real-time information on air quality and set your air purifiers as you prefer. Thanks to its latest generation sensors, Natede Smart and Eteria are able to monitor the air quality and provide you with updates on the levels of:


- Temperature 
- Humidity 
- VOCs
- PM2.5
- CO2

Natede Smart and Eteria can adapt to the surrounding environment through different ways. In fact, you can adjust the fan speed according to your needs, or set the automatic mode and let them work depending on the level of pollution in the air.

To activate it via Alexa download the "Vitesy" app from the App Store or from the Play Store > register your Natede in the app > click "Enable Skill" from the Alexa app > log in with the profile used to access the “Vitesy” app.

Following these steps, you can start using the features of your Natede Smart and your Eteria through Alexa only with your voice.

Several interactions are available with Alexa: you can request particular information regarding the air quality or give precise commands to your device.

Enjoy the experience with Vitesy.
Because if you breathe better, you live better.
